We create a chart which has one ColumnSeries and one LineSeries. It also has two LInearAxis.

How could I make the ColumnSeries to be draw againt the axes on the left and the LineSeries drawn againt the axes on the right.

Thanks
Use the LinearAxis have a Location Property. Set the LinearAxis used for the ColumnSeries to Left the otherone to Right.
